msml:operator.name: ExtractBoundarySurfaceByMaterials
msml:operator.meta: Extract a boundary surface between two or more regions of a volume mesh (where regions are defined by material ids).

arg.name: boundarySurface
arg.meta: The boundary surface, that is, the surface between two or more volume regions.

arg.name: baseRegionMaterial
arg.meta: Material ID of the base volume region, cells of the boundary surface will be taken from this region.

arg.name: otherRegionsMaterial
arg.meta: Material IDs of the other volume regions, if cells of base volume have neighbors in one of the regions, these cells will be extracted.

arg.name: boundarySurfaceMaterial
arg.meta: Material ID of the extracted boundary surface. Must be a material ID NOT occuring in input volume.
